Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facades.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    A facade which is received when a company logs in.

    asafs94

      • createCoupon

        public void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws ApplicationException
        Creates a new Coupon in the database for the company. A coupon cannot be created if a coupon by that name already exists.
        Parameters:
        coupon -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • deleteCoupon

        public void deleteCoupon(long coupon_id)
                  throws ApplicationException
        Deletes A Coupon from the database. Both from all clients records and from the coupon list.
        Parameters:
        coupon_id -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws ApplicationException
        Updates a coupon. Changes the data of the coupon on the database, to the coupon received in the method. A coupon cannot be updated if its name has been changed.
        Parameters:
        coupon -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException
